DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare incidence Postoperative nausea vomit intervention group receive multimodal antiemetic management control group get protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Post Operative Nausea Vomiting Ambulatory Gynecologic Laparoscopy
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory gynecologic laparoscopy Age 1845 year ASA class 12 The patient take opioid , steroid , pyschotics antiemetic drug within 24 hour surgery History antiemetic , anesthetic analgesic drug allergy Pregnancy breast feed Body mass index > 34 kg/square metre
